name.ja: <ruby>烏賊合の衆<rt>デビルフーリッシュ</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: During the turn you Normal Summoned this card, reveal up to 2 monsters with 0 DEF in your hand.

effect.en: Special Summon monsters with 0 DEF from your Graveyard, up to [the number of monsters revealed to meet the requirement], to your field in face-down Defense Position. For the rest of this turn, you cannot Normal Summon Level 9 or lower monsters nor Set monsters from the hand.
